name: Easter Egg Fun Pro
description: This is the time to celebrate the Easter. Have great fun with new Easter Egg Fun game. It is a mind blowing puzzle game that keeps you busy for hours. The ultimate puzzle game where you have to make an egg to jump over another adjacent egg to eliminate it from the board, at last you will have only one egg on the board and now you are the winner. Before moving an egg, keep in mind that one wrong move may lead you to a deadlock position and you can lose the game. There are many difficulty levels with increasing fun and challenges. Let’s see how much of the levels you finish in a minimum possible time.
